il.ac.hit.couponstorem.controller

Class CouponAdminServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • il.ac.hit.couponstorem.controller.CouponAdminServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/CouponAdminServlet")
public class CouponAdminServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Servlet implementation class CouponAdminServlet. This Servlet manage the session for the administrator users with elevate privileges.
    Author:
    nadav Eliyahu.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • CheckCategory

        public boolean CheckCategory(java.lang.String category)
        This method check if the given category exist in the application . This method returns true if the category exist in the application .
        Parameters:
        category - the category is a string that describe the category of which the coupon belongs to .
        Returns:
        boolean value.

      • gotoNavBarJSP

        public void gotoNavBarJSP(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                 java.lang.String tailStr)
                   throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                          java.io.IOException
        This method forward the user request to a specific page from the upper navigation bar.
        Parameters:
        request - the request is this CouponUserServlet request object that holds the reference to the user request.@see HttpServletRequest.
        response - the response is this CouponUserServlet response object that holds the reference to server response.@see HttpServletRespons.
        tailStr - the tailStr is a string object that represent the end of the URL.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - if there was a wrong user request
        java.io.IOException - if there was a bad response from the server.
